title: Warning message!!
body:
Hello yesterday i had a big problem with my internet connection so when i was going to play a game i was disconnected from the game and then i immediately reconnected as fast as i could but when get finaly in the game my team surr the game so it was defete and then i was reciving a message that **'I AGREE'** to do not leaving any game in the future, so now what happens next time i will get a ban for it?
cuz my internet conection is not so good as it was... 
thank you for your time.

replies.body:
If it becomes a consistant issue you will receive low priority queues, which means you have to wait for a time to join a queue to play a game. If you are with other people they have to wait too. If you enter the queue and then back out you have to wait again. I think it starts at 5 minutes and ends up at 20 minutes for 5 games.

A red said the other day that if it keeps happening past that then you can get other punishments too, but idk the details on that.
well if they could do something about the people that have a bad connection problems cuz riot thinks sometimes that players who have bad conection they are quit.

It doesn't matter why you aren't in the game, the impact on your team is the same.

If you have connection issues you need to troubleshoot and resolve them so that you are no longer negatively impacting your teams.
If you know your internet is unreliable, why are you playing league?
